definition[0]: used to say that someone does work in addition to their regular job
example[0]: Most consultants do private work on the side.
example[1]: His wife discovered that he had a woman on the side.
definition[2]: food that is served on the side is ordered with the main dish in a restaurant, but is not usually part of that dish
example[2]: Iâ€™d like eggs with toast on the side.
